participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, with a love for music and culinary adventures.
participant_1.background: I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy. I will continue to follow my passion and live my life to the fullest, even if others don't understand or approve. I play jazz piano in a band. I have never kissed a woman. I like to go out to eat.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and introspective, enjoying the simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: I wake up, take my dog, Collie, for a walk and then drink the day away. I plan to retire in 6 months. My favorite fiction genres are sci fi and horror. I used to work as a clown, but I lost my job due to the pandemic. I love to listen to music while I'm working on my photography projects.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a jazz musician.
Nice! What instrument do you play?
I love music. I love listening to music while I'm working on my photography projects.
What kind of photography do you do?
I do a lot of nature photography. I love taking photos of animals and plants.
That sounds really cool! I love going out to eat. Do you have any favorite restaurants?
I love going to sushi restaurants. I also love going to steakhouses.
I love sushi too! I don't eat a lot of meat, but I do enjoy a good steak every once in a while.
I'm glad you like sushi! I know a great place if you're ever in my city.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll have to check it out next time I'm in your city.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great day!
